flavorText: The vedalken embed such urns in their living artifact creations.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Vedalken bauen solche Urnen gerne in ihre lebenden Artefaktkreationen ein.
foreignData.name: Blinkmottenurne
foreignData.text: Zu Beginn der Hauptphase vor dem Kampf jedes Spielers erhöht dieser Spieler seinen Manavorrat um {1} für jedes Artefakt, das er kontrolliert, falls die Blinkmottenurne ungetappt ist.

foreignData.flavorText: Los vedalken incrustan estas urnas en sus artefactos vivientes.
foreignData.name: Urna de polillas titilantes
foreignData.text: Al comienzo de la fase principal precombate de cada jugador, si la Urna de polillas titilantes está enderezada, ese jugador agrega {1} a su reserva de maná por cada artefacto que controle.

foreignData.flavorText: Les veldakens scellent ces urnes dans tous les artefacts vivants qu'ils fabriquent.
foreignData.name: Urne à scintimite
foreignData.text: Au début de la phase principale de chaque joueur, avant le combat, si l'Urne à scintimite est dégagée, ce joueur ajoute {1} à sa réserve pour chaque artefact qu'il contrôle.

foreignData.flavorText: I vedalken incastonano queste urne in tutti gli artefatti viventi che creano.
foreignData.name: Urna di Lampidotteri
foreignData.text: All'inizio della fase principale precedente al combattimento di ciascun giocatore, se l'Urna di Lampidotteri è STAPpata, quel giocatore aggiunge {1} alla propria riserva di mana per ogni artefatto che controlla.

foreignData.flavorText: ヴィダルケンは、この手の甕を生命を持つアーティファクトの中に埋め込んでいる。
foreignData.name: ちらつき蛾の甕
foreignData.text: 各プレイヤーの戦闘前メイン・フェイズの開始時に、ちらつき蛾の甕がアンタップ状態の場合、そのプレイヤーは自分のマナ・プールに、そのプレイヤーがコントロールするアーティファクト１つにつき{1}を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: Os vedalkeanos inscrustam tais urnas nos artefatos vivos que criam.
foreignData.name: Urna de Mosco-Lumes
foreignData.text: No início da fase principal pré-combate de cada jogador, se Urna de Mosco-Lumes estiver desvirada, aquele jogador adiciona {1} à sua própria reserva de mana para cada artefato que ele próprio controla.

name: Blinkmoth Urn
originalText: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, if Blinkmoth Urn is untapped, that player adds {1} to his or her mana pool for each artifact he or she controls.

rulings.text: The precombat main phase is the first main phase of the turn. All others are postcombat main phases, even if they technically occur before combat.
The “precombat main phase” is the first main phase of the turn. All other main phases are “postcombat main phases.”

text: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, if Blinkmoth Urn is untapped, that player adds {C} for each artifact they control.
